block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an Origami Decorative Butterfly designed by Dokuohtei Nakano in this video. This tutorial is is 1:42 minute long. Tried to make it less than a minute but the video would have been too fast to follow. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

meta_description: Heap Art Origami tutorial, How to fold Butterfly by Dokuohtei Nakano
meta_keywords: Heap Art Origami Tutorial, Heap Art, origami, tutorial, video, how to, short video, vertical video, butterfly by dokuohtei nakano, Dokuohtei Nakano
